name: Sol Raiders
storyline:
Earth Is Gone...

The last remnants of humanity are travelling the universe in search of new worlds... and new wealth.

The aliens left behind Sol, a power source unlike any other. If you get the Sol, you've got it made. But it won't be easy as everyone is chasing it!

The winners make the score. The losers are just scrap metal.

Get ready to raid!
summary: Form your crew and prepare for blistering, team-based combat across 3 diverse maps, complete with unique objectives. The ultimate competitive virtual reality experience for up to 8 players. Fun for casual players and professionals alike.
